name: Kastle
headline: AI agents for mortgage servicing
description:
Kastle is an AI voice agent for mortgage servicing. We help servicers collect payments, verify new borrowers, and qualify new loan inquiries over the phone. 

Rishi and Nitish met at UIUC where they graduated with degrees in systems engineering and computer science.  Rishi was the founding Product Manager for Redfin’s Mortgage Marketplace at 22 and grew the business from $3M to $6M in revenue in 9 months. Nitish patented Verkada’s motion search system and was the youngest tech lead at the company at 23.

While building Redfin's Mortgage Marketplace Rishi realized traditional lenders didn't have the infrastructure to service online inquiries and were losing customers. Nitish and Rishi are building Kastle to help traditional financial services companies better interface with their customers.

founders.name: Rishi Choudhary, Founder
founders.description:
Rishi is the co-founder and CEO of Kastle (www.kastle.ai)

Before Kastle, Rishi was the founding Product Manager for Redfin’s Mortgage Marketplace at age 22 and grew the business from $3M to $6M in revenue in 9 months. He also led Redfin's Search Experience team responsible for 80% of the company's traffic. 

Rishi has a BS in Systems Engineering from the University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign. At UIUC, Rishi ran the largest US student consulting club with 250 students and $500K ARR

founders.name: Nitish Poddar, Founder
founders.description: Nitish is the co-founder and CTO of Kastle (kastle.ai). Before Kastle, Nitish was a tech lead at Verkada, where he led development for a patented motion search system and built out the entire backend inference infrastructure. He also led the firmware delivery team on a new fleet management system and led engineering for Incident Management, Verkada's newest product line. Nitish graduated from UIUC with a degree in Computer Science.

Automate customer interactions 24x7, across call, text, email, and webchat to drive retention and collections

# Voice AI agents for mortgage servicing
Automate customer interactions 24x7, across call, text, email, and webchat to drive retention and collections

## A better customer experience at a fraction of a price
![feature-icon-01](https://framerusercontent.com/images/v5Bri6AV8ud5lW6wcX5GbkPKro8.svg)
![feature-icon-01](https://framerusercontent.com/images/v5Bri6AV8ud5lW6wcX5GbkPKro8.svg)
##### Payments and Escrow
Resolve inbound requests for payments and escrow without having to staff a team after hours
![feature-icon-03](https://framerusercontent.com/images/wv6fhlFK89MtfpMqSIEXLQKVRBg.svg)
![feature-icon-03](https://framerusercontent.com/images/wv6fhlFK89MtfpMqSIEXLQKVRBg.svg)
##### Outbound collections
Provide low friction avenues for early delinquent customers to make payments
![feature-icon-02](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xa7Nt8c6dGrhyFWucV7vtmRNo.svg)
![feature-icon-02](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xa7Nt8c6dGrhyFWucV7vtmRNo.svg)
##### Sales Support 
Qualify new customers and repeat borrowers with real time verification, rate quotes, and rapport
![feature-image-01](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jOecM2bhjodZYMheNV7LBxRreM.png)

### Safe. Secure. Compliant
Kastle takes industry-leading security measures to protect your sensitive data. We have pre-trained our models to comply agent responses with stringent regulatory frameworks within mortgage lending
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ay60oQxQ9HGB7LWUzt1GWl4sQn0.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ay60oQxQ9HGB7LWUzt1GWl4sQn0.svg)

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ay60oQxQ9HGB7LWUzt1GWl4sQn0.svg)
Rigorous security reviews
### Integrates with your systems
Kastle's AI agents seamlessly integrate with your contact center and enterprise systems – on-premises or in the cloud. No rip and replace, no vendor lock-in.

generated_description:
**Kastle: AI-Driven Mortgage Servicing**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Kastle is on a mission to revolutionize mortgage servicing through intelligent AI agents. Co-founded by Rishi and Nitish—both graduates of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign—they leverage their impressive backgrounds to tackle inefficiencies in the industry. Rishi previously helped scale Redfin’s Mortgage Marketplace significantly in just nine months. Nitish, a patented innovator, made waves as the youngest tech lead at Verkada.

Kastle began as an AI voice agent designed specifically for mortgage servicing, tackling issues like payment collection, borrower verification, and loan inquiry qualification—all over the phone. Recognizing that traditional lenders are often bogged down by outdated infrastructure, Rishi and Nitish aimed to bridge the gap between these institutions and their customers through seamless, automated interactions.

### What Kastle Does

Their AI agents operate 24/7, managing customer interactions through calls, texts, emails, and web chats. This not only enhances customer experience but also drives retention and facilitates collections. Key features include:

- **Payments & Escrow**: Handling inbound requests without the need for after-hours staffing.
- **Outbound Collections**: Providing easy payment options for customers in early delinquency.
- **Sales Support**: Qualifying new and repeat borrowers with real-time responses.

Kastle prides itself on security, ensuring compliance with mortgage regulations while protecting sensitive customer data. Their technology integrates smoothly with existing systems—on-premises and in the cloud—allowing clients to avoid vendor lock-in and extensive overhauls.

### The Future of Kastle

With a compact team of just two, Kastle is small but mighty. They’ve already achieved accolades such as winning LendingTree's Innovation Challenge, showcasing their potential to positively impact businesses and consumers alike. Their promise? Cost savings of up to 80% per call—evidence that transforming traditional industries can be both efficient and profitable.

If you're curious about how AI can enhance your mortgage business, visit [Kastle’s website](https://kastle.ai/) and consider booking a demo. The future of mortgage servicing is here, and it speaks with a voice powered by Kastle.
